verses.roman:
ebe śuna, prema, yei-mūla 'prayojana'
pulakāśru-nṛtya-gīta-yāhāra lakṣaṇa

synonyms: ebe śuna—now hear; prema—love of Godhead; yei—which; mūla prayojana—the chief objective; pulaka-aśru-nṛtya-gīta—trembling of the body, tears in the eyes, dancing and chanting; yāhāra lakṣaṇa—the symptoms of which.
translation: "Now hear from Me what actual love of Godhead is. It is the prime object of life and is symptomized by bodily trembling, tears in the eyes, chanting and dancing.
